response.overview: When Indian businessman Yuvaraj (Aryan Rajesh) comes to Korumamidi to find a bride, he immediately sets his sights on Radha (Anu Mehta). She, however, has her eye on another (Allari Naresh). It's not until that man is reported dead that Yuvaraj has a chance with her. Or does he? Just as sparks begin to fly between Yuvaraj and Radha, the old boyfriend turns up alive, and things quickly get complicated in this song- and dance-filled love story.
response.title: Nuvvante Naakistam
